title: A Town Called Discovery
description: A new time-travel thriller from Washington Post, Wall Street Journal, Amazon & Audible bestselling author, RR Haywood. Creator of the smash-hit time travel series – Extracted and the UK’s #1 Horror Series, The Undead A man falls from the sky. He has no memory. He has no sense of self. What lies ahead are a series of tests. Each more brutal than the last, and if he gets through them all, he might just reach A Town Called Discovery.
author: R.R. Haywood
